00028  //
00029  // Scaled Conjugate Gradient algorithm based heavily on the Netlab
00030  // toolbox originally written in Matlab by Prof Ian Nabney
00031  //
00032  // History:
00033  //
00034  // 12 Dec 2008 - BRI - First implementation. 
00035  //
00036 
00037 #include "SCGModelTrainer.h"
00038 
00039 SCGModelTrainer::SCGModelTrainer(Optimisable& m) : ModelTrainer(m)
00040 {
00041         algorithmName = "Scaled Conjugate Gradient";
00042 }
00043 
00044 SCGModelTrainer::~SCGModelTrainer()
00045 {
00046 
00047 }
00048 void SCGModelTrainer::Train(int numIterations)
00049 {
00050         double sigma0 = 1.0e-4;
00051         double beta = 1.0;
00052         double betaMin = 1.0e-15;
00053         double betaMax = 1.0e100;
00054         double kappa = 0.0;
00055         double mu = 0.0;        
00056         double sigma;
00057         double theta = 0.0;
00058         double delta; // check delta and Delta
00059         double alpha, fOld, fNew, fNow;
00060         double Delta;
00061                         
00062         vec direction, gradNew, gradOld, gPlus, xPlus, xNew;
00063         vec x = getParameters();
00064                                 
00065         int numParams, numSuccess;
00066         bool success;
00067                 
00068         fOld = errorFunction(x);
00069         fNow = fOld;
00070 
00071         gradNew = errorGradients(x);
00072         gradOld = gradNew;
00073 
00074         direction = -gradNew;
00075 
00076         numParams = gradNew.size();
00077         success = true;
00078         numSuccess = 0;
00079                 
00080         if(gradientCheck)
00081         {
00082                 if (analyticGradients) 
00083                     cout << "Using analytical gradients" << endl;
00084                 else
00085                     cout << "Using numerical (finite differences) gradient" << endl;
00086                 
00087             checkGradient();
00088         }
00089                 
00090         // Main loop
00091         for (int j = 1; j <= numIterations; j++ )
00092         {
00093                 if (success)
00094                 {
00095                         mu = dot(direction, gradNew);
00096                         if ( mu >= 0.0 )
00097                         {
00098                                 direction = -gradNew;
00099                                 mu = dot(direction, gradNew);
00100                         }
00101                                 
00102                         kappa = dot(direction, direction);
00103 
00104                         // eps exists in ITPP? remember to check this!
00105                         if(kappa < eps)
00106                         {
00107                                 functionValue = fNow;
00108                                 setParameters(x);
00109                                 return;
00110                         }
00111                         sigma = sigma0 / sqrt(kappa);
00112                         xPlus = x + (sigma * direction);
00113                         gPlus = errorGradients(xPlus);
00114                         theta = dot(direction, gPlus - gradNew) / sigma;        
00115                 }
00116                 
00117                 delta = theta + (beta * kappa);
00118                         
00119                 if ( delta <= 0.0 )
00120                 {       
00121                     delta = beta * kappa;
00122                         beta = beta - ( theta / kappa );
00123                     //double olddelta = delta;
00124                     //double oldbeta = beta;
00125                     //beta = 2.0*(oldbeta - olddelta/kappa);
00126                     //delta = oldbeta*kappa - olddelta;
00127                 }
00128                 alpha = - ( mu / delta );
00129                 
00130                 xNew = x + (alpha * direction);
00131                 fNew = errorFunction(xNew);
00132 
00133                 Delta = 2.0 * ( fNew - fOld ) / (alpha * mu);
00134                 if ( Delta >= 0.0 )
00135                 {
00136                         success = true;
00137                         numSuccess++;
00138                         x = xNew;
00139                         
00140                         // RB: Do we need to set parameters here?
00141                         setParameters(x);
00142                         fNow = fNew;
00143                 }
00144                 else
00145                 {
00146                         success = false;
00147                         fNow = fOld;
00148                 }
00149                         
00150                 if(display)
00151                 {
00152                         cout << "Cycle " << j;
00153                         cout << "  Error " << fNow;
00154                         cout << "  Scale " << beta << endl;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 if(success)
00158                 {
00159                         if ((max(alpha * direction) < parameterTolerance) && (abs( fNew - fOld )) < errorTolerance )
00160                         {
00161                                 functionValue = fNew;
00162                                 // setParameters(x); 
00163                                 return;
00164                         }
00165                         else
00166                         {
00167                                 fOld = fNew;
00168                                 gradOld = gradNew;
00169                                 gradNew = errorGradients(x);
00170                                 
00171                                 if(dot(gradNew, gradNew) < 1e-16)
00172                                 {
00173                                         functionValue = fNew;
00174                                         // setParameters(x);
00175                                         return;
00176                                 }
00177                         }
00178                 }
00179                         
00180                 if ( Delta < 0.25 )
00181                 {
00182                         beta = min( 4.0 * beta, betaMax );
00183                 }
00184                         
00185                 if ( Delta > 0.75 )
00186                 {
00187                         beta = max( 0.5 * beta, betaMin );
00188                 }
00189                         
00190                 if ( numSuccess == numParams )
00191                 {
00192                         direction = -gradNew;
00193                         numSuccess = 0;
00194                 }
00195                 else
00196                 {
00197                         if (success)
00198                         {
00199                                 double gamma = dot(gradOld - gradNew, (gradNew / mu));
00200                                 direction = (gamma * direction) - gradNew;
00201                         }
00202                 }
00203         }
00204                 
00205         if(display)
00206         {
00207                 cout << "Warning: Maximum number of iterations has been exceeded" << endl;              
00208         }
00209 
00210         functionValue = fOld;
00211         // setParameters(x);
00212         
00213         // Check last gradient (to make sure everything went fine
00214         if (gradientCheck) checkGradient();
00215         
00216         return;
00217 }
